pages.text: But those that disbelieve and deny Our revelations shall be the inmates of the Fire, wherein shall they abide for ever: an wretched fate
No misfortune strikes except by God‘s leave. He guides the hearts of those who believe in Him; God has knowledge of all things
And obey God and obey the Apostle. If you pay no heed, Our apostle‘s duty is only to give the veritable warning
God ― there is no god but Him. In God let the faithful put their trust
Believers, in your spouses and in your children you have an enemy: beware of them. But if you overlook their offences and forgive and pardon them, then know that God is forgiving and compassionate
Your wealth and your children are but a temptation. God‘s recompense is great
therefore fear God with all your hearts, and be attentive, obedient, and charitable. That will be best for you. Those that preserve themselves from their own greed will surely prosper
If you give a generous loan to God, He will pay you back twofold and will forgive you. Gracious is God, and benignant
He has knowledge of the unknown and the manifest. He is the Almighty, the Wise One
